xdcr_changes_left_total.name: changes_left
xdcr_changes_left_total.help: Given the VBs of this node, the number of seqnos that need to be processed (either replicated or handled) before catching up to the high sequence numbers for the VBs.

xdcr_add_docs_written_total.name: add_docs_written
xdcr_add_docs_written_total.help: Number of adds successfully written to target, meaning that target does not have the identical doc by name.

xdcr_expiry_failed_cr_source_total.name: expiry_failed_cr_source
xdcr_expiry_failed_cr_source_total.help: Subset of the number of documents that failed source-side conflict resolution that specifically had expiry flag set.

xdcr_deletion_filtered_total.name: deletion_filtered
xdcr_deletion_filtered_total.help: Number of documents filtered that was of a DCP deletion.

xdcr_docs_written_total.name: docs_written
xdcr_docs_written_total.help: Number of docs written/sent to target cluster.

xdcr_deletion_docs_written_total.name: deletion_docs_written
xdcr_deletion_docs_written_total.help: Number of deletion written to target.

xdcr_add_docs_cas_changed_total.name: add_docs_cas_changed
xdcr_add_docs_cas_changed_total.help: Number of add failed because target cas changed.

xdcr_deletion_failed_cr_source_total.name: deletion_failed_cr_source
xdcr_deletion_failed_cr_source_total.help: Subset of the number of documents that failed source-side conflict resolution that were delete operations.

xdcr_time_committing_seconds.name: time_committing
xdcr_time_committing_seconds.help: The rolling average amount of time it takes for a checkpoint operation to complete.

xdcr_docs_checked_total.name: docs_checked
xdcr_docs_checked_total.help: Across VBs for this node, the sum of all seqnos that have been considered to be checkpointed.

xdcr_data_replicated_bytes.name: data_replicated
xdcr_data_replicated_bytes.help: Amount of data replicated for a replication.

xdcr_dcp_dispatch_time_seconds.name: dcp_dispatch_time
xdcr_dcp_dispatch_time_seconds.help: The rolling average amount of time it takes for a document to be received by XDCR from DCP, to the time it is queued up in the out nozzle ready to be sent.

xdcr_set_docs_cas_changed_total.name: set_docs_cas_changed
xdcr_set_docs_cas_changed_total.help: Number of set failed because target cas changed.

xdcr_docs_received_from_dcp.name: docs_received_from_dcp
xdcr_docs_received_from_dcp.help: The number of set operations received from DCP.

xdcr_set_target_docs_skipped_total.name: set_target_docs_skipped
xdcr_set_target_docs_skipped_total.help: Subset of the number of documents that originated from the target that were set operations.

xdcr_throughput_throttle_latency_seconds.name: throughput_throttle_latency
xdcr_throughput_throttle_latency_seconds.help: The rolling average of the latency time introduced due to throughput throttler.

xdcr_expiry_docs_merge_failed_total.name: expiry_docs_merge_failed
xdcr_expiry_docs_merge_failed_total.help: Number of conflicting expiry docs failed to merge.

xdcr_set_received_from_dcp_total.name: set_received_from_dcp
xdcr_set_received_from_dcp_total.help: The subset of documents received from DCP that is a mutation (set action).

xdcr_expiry_filtered_total.name: expiry_filtered
xdcr_expiry_filtered_total.help: Number of documents filtered that had expiry flag set.

xdcr_docs_merged_total.name: docs_merged
xdcr_docs_merged_total.help: Number of conflicting docs successfully merged.

xdcr_expiry_target_docs_skipped_total.name: expiry_target_docs_skipped
xdcr_expiry_target_docs_skipped_total.help: Subset of the number of documents that originated from the target that specifically had expiry flag set.

xdcr_resp_wait_time_seconds.name: resp_wait_time
xdcr_resp_wait_time_seconds.help: The rolling average amount of time it takes from when a MemcachedRequest is created to be ready to route to an outnozzle to the time that the response has been heard back from the target node after a successful write.

xdcr_docs_failed_cr_source_total.name: docs_failed_cr_source
xdcr_docs_failed_cr_source_total.help: Number of documents that was not replicated to the target due to conflict resolution evaluated on the source cluster.

xdcr_expiry_merge_cas_changed_total.name: expiry_merge_cas_changed
xdcr_expiry_merge_cas_changed_total.help: Number of expiry merges failed because source cas changed.

xdcr_docs_rep_queue_total.name: docs_rep_queue
xdcr_docs_rep_queue_total.help: Number of documents being queued to be sent in an out nozzle.

xdcr_docs_filtered_total.name: docs_filtered
xdcr_docs_filtered_total.help: Total number of documents filtered and not replicated due to any type of filtering.

xdcr_set_docs_written_total.name: set_docs_written
xdcr_set_docs_written_total.help: Number of sets written to target.

xdcr_deletion_docs_cas_changed_total.name: deletion_docs_cas_changed
xdcr_deletion_docs_cas_changed_total.help: Number of deletion failed because target cas changed.

xdcr_throttle_latency_seconds.name: throttle_latency
xdcr_throttle_latency_seconds.help: The rolling average of the latency time introduced due to bandwith throttler.

xdcr_expiry_received_from_dcp_total.name: expiry_received_from_dcp
xdcr_expiry_received_from_dcp_total.help: The subset of documents received from DCP that either 1.) Is a DCP expiration or 2) Is a document that contains an expiration time.

xdcr_wtavg_meta_latency_seconds.name: wtavg_meta_latency
xdcr_wtavg_meta_latency_seconds.help: The rolling average amount of time it takes once a getMeta command is composed to be sent to the time the request is handled once the target node has responded.

xdcr_data_merged_bytes.name: data_merged
xdcr_data_merged_bytes.help: Amount of data merged for a replication.

xdcr_wtavg_merge_latency_seconds.name: wtavg_merge_latency
xdcr_wtavg_merge_latency_seconds.help: The rolling average amount of time it takes from routing, conflict detection and resolution, to receive the acknowledgement of merge.

xdcr_deletion_target_docs_skipped_total.name: deletion_target_docs_skipped
xdcr_deletion_target_docs_skipped_total.help: Subset of the number of documents that originated from the target that were delete operations.

xdcr_set_filtered_total.name: set_filtered
xdcr_set_filtered_total.help: Number of documents filtered that was of a DCP mutation.

xdcr_docs_opt_repd_total.name: docs_opt_repd
xdcr_docs_opt_repd_total.help: Number of documents optimistically replicated to the target.

xdcr_wtavg_docs_latency_seconds.name: wtavg_docs_latency
xdcr_wtavg_docs_latency_seconds.help: The rolling average amount of time it takes for the source cluster to receive the acknowledgement of a SET_WITH_META response after the Memcached request has been composed to be processed by the XDCR outnozzle.

xdcr_docs_cloned_total.name: docs_cloned
xdcr_docs_cloned_total.help: The number of times a source mutation is cloned to be written to different target namespace.

xdcr_expiry_docs_merged_total.name: expiry_docs_merged
xdcr_expiry_docs_merged_total.help: Number of expiry merged and written to source.

xdcr_set_failed_cr_source_total.name: set_failed_cr_source
xdcr_set_failed_cr_source_total.help: Subset of the number of documents that failed source-side conflict resolution that were set operations.

xdcr_num_failedckpts_total.name: num_failedckpts
xdcr_num_failedckpts_total.help: The number of times checkpoint operation has encountered an error since this XDCR process instance is made aware of this replication.

xdcr_size_rep_queue_bytes.name: size_rep_queue
xdcr_size_rep_queue_bytes.help: Amount of data being queued to be sent in an out nozzle.

xdcr_deletion_received_from_dcp_total.name: deletion_received_from_dcp
xdcr_deletion_received_from_dcp_total.help: The subset of documents received from DCP that is a Delete action.

xdcr_expiry_stripped_total.name: expiry_stripped
xdcr_expiry_stripped_total.help: Number of documents replicated that had its TTL changed to 0 before writing to target (source is unmodified).

xdcr_num_checkpoints_total.name: num_checkpoints
xdcr_num_checkpoints_total.help: The number of times checkpoint operation has completed successfully since this XDCR process instance is made aware of this replication.

xdcr_docs_processed_total.name: docs_processed
xdcr_docs_processed_total.help: Number of docs processed for a replication.

xdcr_docs_unable_to_filter_total.name: docs_unable_to_filter
xdcr_docs_unable_to_filter_total.help: Number of documents that couldn't be filtered due to inability to parse the document through Advanced Filtering engine and were not replicated.

xdcr_wtavg_get_doc_latency_seconds.name: wtavg_get_doc_latency
xdcr_wtavg_get_doc_latency_seconds.help: The rolling average amount of time it takes once a get document command is composed to be sent to the time the request is handled once the target node has responded.

xdcr_target_docs_skipped_total.name: target_docs_skipped
xdcr_target_docs_skipped_total.help: Number of documents that was not replicated to the target because they originated from the target.

xdcr_expiry_docs_written_total.name: expiry_docs_written
xdcr_expiry_docs_written_total.help: Number of expiry written to target.

xdcr_datapool_failed_gets_total.name: datapool_failed_gets
xdcr_datapool_failed_gets_total.help: The total number of failed GET() operation on a reusable datapool within XDCR for the purpose of avoiding garbage generation.

xdcr_dcp_datach_length_total.name: dcp_datach_length
xdcr_dcp_datach_length_total.help: The number of items sent by KV DCP waiting for XDCR DCP nozzle to ingest and process.

xdcr_docs_merge_cas_changed_total.name: docs_merge_cas_changed
xdcr_docs_merge_cas_changed_total.help: Number of merges failed because source cas changed.
